bioconda.name: bioconductor-csar
bioconda.summary: Statistical tools for the analysis of ChIP-seq data

biotools.summary: Statistical tools for ChIP-seq data analysis. Taking the average DNA fragment size subjected to sequencing into account, the software calculates genomic single-nucleotide read-enrichment values. After normalization, sample and control are compared using a test based on the Poisson distribution. Test statistic thresholds to control the false discovery rate are obtained through random permutation.

bioschemas.name: CSAR
